name: Blobby Run
description:
Challenge yourself and avoid the obstacles!

This game is a Blobby runner, the Blob embarks on an adventure that is a never-ending cluster of obstacles. You have to help the blob safely avoid obstacles, the only thing is that it is NEVER ENDING! Only the strongest can survive for the longest, not getting confused and letting the blob die is the most important thing in this simple runner. Who knows if there's an end and what is beyond those smoky hills... And will the obstacles will ever disappear from Blob's life?

Do you dare to embark on this adventure that will only end when you decide it to end?

If so click PLAY!
